settings.testimonial: After 1 year of starting Face Reality, I dropped all my lash clients and went full blast acne.  I had to hire 2 other Estheticians to help with the work load! Isn’t that crazy? My clientele is 95% acne! Face Reality was the best, most impactful decision I made for my career - I am rewarded daily with an income that I only dreamed about, plus I deliver incredible value and confidence to my clients that no one else can!
settings.title: Lori Ward Skincare

settings.testimonial: Becoming a Certified Acne Specialist has not only changed my life personally with Acne but has allowed me to change hundreds of people’s lives through the knowledge of what causes Acne. Having the knowledge I have of what causes Acne and how to maintain healthy clear skin through daily lifestyle choices, eating habits, and a balanced skincare regimen has been a true blessing. I am grateful to be able to share my knowledge with hundreds of people a week through myself, social media, and my business.
settings.title: Spa Kingston

settings.testimonial: We are committed to bringing only the best and highest quality to our clients; in service, professionalism and product lines. Face Reality is one of our biggest ways of providing this. Providing our acne clients with Face Reality products and services is a way to extend that respect for our clients, who we believe are the backbone of our lovely little place.
settings.title: Marisa's Skin Care
Join the team of highly successful acne specialists.

settings.content_top:
In her mid-thirties, she finally found an esthetician who got her skin clear. She immediately felt compelled to help others as she had been helped. After all, she knew first-hand how adversely it had affected her life; and she wanted to spare others the agony of dealing with acne.


She became a California state-licensed esthetician in 1990 and set out to learn everything about acne that she could. After having been a sole practitioner for many years, her dream of opening an acne-only clinic came true in 2005. As a result of her astounding results with acne, other estheticians started demanding classes to learn her protocol. Out of this was born her comprehensive Acne Specialist training and she has certified over 400 skin care professionals, including nurses and doctors, around the United States.
settings.content_middle: Laura knows first-hand how adversely acne can affect people's lives; and she wants to spare others the suffering that it can bring.
settings.content_bottom: She organized the first U.S. conference for acne specialists in September 2014, and continues to write articles about acne and acne treatment in several skin care industry publications. She is continually doing research and testing products to increase her understanding of the disease known as retention hyperkeratosis, aka acne.
settings.cta_content: Learn more about Face Reality Skincare, and how we can help grow your esthetician business.

settings.title_top: Acne can be controlled with the right products and process.
settings.description_top:
Acne is a mysterious skin disorder, but one thing is for sure – it can be controlled with the right combination of treatments and products. Just as in a clogged drain, the pore must be treated with products that unclog it and kill the acne bacteria.

Our clear-skin system will have your client’s acne under control in about 3-4 months without the use of prescription medications. We combine the power of premium products and a comprehensive treatment protocol to successfully treat even your most challenging acne clients.
settings.title_bottom: Find the right products for your clients' skin.  And teach them how they should be used.
settings.description_bottom:
Unlike other skincare solutions, our approach is not “one size fits all." Face Reality provides custom home care options for every age, gender, acne type and skin type, including Fitzpatrick 4+. We even take it one step further and take diet and lifestyle factors into careful consideration. In as little as 3-4 months, your clients will see breakouts and hyperpigmentation diminish as well as a drastic improvement in their overall complexion.

The most important aspect of our clear-skin system is not just starting your clients with the right products, but teaching them how to use them properly at home. It’s all about the right routine. In our Acne Specialist Certification Training, we’ll teach you how to adjust your client’s regimen to ensure their skin stays receptive to their acne-fighting products without causing irritation or dehydration.

settings.testimonial: This place really is amazing and anyone with acne knows $25 (which they waive if you elect to get a treatment) is REALLY cheap and worth it to get his or her skin under control. I have been to so many different places, spent tons of money, even tried the stuff from acne.org, just to be disappointed. I finally decided to check this place out based on all the great reviews and really nice man (Pat) I spoke with at the clinic over the phone. This place is the first place I have been able to leave from after getting a facial where I didn’t feel like I needed to hide.
settings.title: Marisa's Skin Care

settings.description: Face Reality Acne Clinic serves San Leandro, Fremont, Hayward, Oakland, East Bay, and the greater San Francisco Bay Area.

settings.title: Face Reality products are specifically formulated for acne-prone skin and are guaranteed not to clog pores.
settings.content:
Face Reality Skincare products are meticulously crafted without acne-causing ingredients that are commonly found in other “acne fighting” skincare lines on the market. We have gone to great lengths to ensure our formulations are made safe for those who struggle with acne. Face Reality products are proprietary (no one else has the same formulas) and contain only the highest-quality skin nourishing ingredients, resulting in significant benefits beyond treating acne.

Our products are never tested on animals.

Become a certified Face Reality Acne Specialist today and gain access to our products at wholesale pricing.

We only ship our products within the United States.

settings.title: Online scheduling
settings.content: You will see a $1 charge on your credit card when using this online scheduler.  It will disappear in a few days – it is just to verify your credit card number.

settings.title: 24-hour notice cancellation policy
settings.content: We require you to give 24 hours notice if you need to cancel or reschedule your appointment or we will charge 50% of your treatment for a missed appointment with the exception of emergencies or if you are ill.

settings.title: No children under 12
settings.content: To maintain a safe environment for everyone, please do not bring children under age 12 to your appointments. Neither our staff, nor you can be responsible for your child while you receive treatments.  Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

settings.title: Late policy
settings.content: If you are more than 20 minutes late we cannot guarantee that we will be able to fit your appointment into the schedule and you may not be seen.  If we cannot fit you in, 50% of your service will be charged for the missed appointment.

settings.title: Product returns
settings.content: Face Reality products may be returned within 30 days for a full refund, provided they have not been opened.

settings.title: Fragrance policy
settings.content: Refrain from wearing perfume, cologne, or any other scented product when coming in for an appointment.  It is important to us to be able to accommodate staff and clientele who are sensitive to fragrance.

settings.title: Concurrent skin care treatment policy
settings.content: Face Reality does not allow other skin care treatments while you are being treated at Face Reality Acne Clinic, including treatments from outside Certified Face Reality Acne Specialists.

settings.title: Health issues
settings.content:
• If you are prone to cold sores, please take an antiviral medication before your appointment. If you have a cold sore, please wait until it is healed before coming in for an appointment. (We cannot perform a treatment if you have a cold sore.)
  • It is our policy that we will not work on anyone who is exhibiting cold or flu symptoms, or currently has an infection of any kind, for the health and wellness of our staff and other clients. We ask that if you have a cold, fever, the flu, infection, virus or feel as though one is coming on, please cancel and re-schedule your appointment. If you have a cold, infection, virus or similar illness, when you arrive for your appointment, you will be asked to re-schedule your appointment.

settings.title: For new clients
settings.content:
• If you have been on any prescription topical product (i.e., Differin, Retin A,Clindamycin, Epiduo, etc.) you MUST discontinue use for two weeks prior to your appointment.
  • If you have been on Accutane equivalents, you MUST discontinue use for at least a month prior to coming in for your first appointment.
  • If, after the consultation, you decide to continue with us as an acne client, you will be required to purchase the recommended products.
  • If you are under 18 you must be accompanied by a parent or guardian (over 18) at your initial appointment.

settings.title: What are the treatments like?
settings.answer: We either do a very mild chemical peel on your skin or we do a gentle enzyme with steam. Generally speaking, neither of these are uncomfortable or will make your skin visibly peel or there might be very mild peeling. We then do extractions of your acne.

settings.laura: Francisco has the classic case of teenage inflamed acne. Acne can really ravage the skin of teenage boys – the hormonal fluctuations that teenage boys have can give them horrendous cysts and often they end up with lifelong scars because of it. We started off using the strongest antibacterials we had to get his inflammation under control in the quickest manner possible. We wanted to get the inflammation down as soon as possible to avoid the scarring that could happen if it was left unchecked. His acne cleared up in four month’s time and he was left with minimal scarring. Francisco and his father drove 1.5 hours (one way) to get to our clinic.
settings.testimonial: I have tried Proactiv and antibiotics and none of them seemed to work to clear my skin. My experience at Face Reality was great! My face started to clear fast after I started coming to the clinic. Yes, the results totally met my expectations and ever since my face has started to clear up, I have been getting noticed by everyone. I recommend Face Reality for people with acne; and for them to come to Face Reality Acne & Skin Care Clinic. It will change your perspective in life.

Orders are shipped Monday through Friday only, excluding federal holidays in the United States. If a signature waiver is in place, Face Reality cannot accept responsibility for lost or stolen packages.

settings.text: We have made it our mission to provide premium products and a comprehensive treatment protocol for estheticians across the country.

settings.title: Face Reality Certification - the most comprehensive acne specialist training available.
settings.description: With +90% success rate, our clear skin program will help you become a confident acne expert and give you the skills to clear your clients' skin.

settings.title: Have questions? Get in touch.
settings.location: Face Reality Skincare offers the most comprehensive acne training to estheticians across the United States. From getting started, to product knowledge and treatment questions, we're here to support you every step of the way.

settings.left_content:
What to expect on the test:

  • 83 questions
  • Has no time limit
  • Open book – review your training videos and documents for reference
  • If you answer any questions incorrectly, you’ll be prompted to go back and submit a new answer at the end of the test
settings.right_content:
Once you pass the test, you’ll be prompted to agree to our terms and upload these required documents:

  • Esthetics license
  • Business license or resale certificate
  • Proof of liability insurance for yourself or the establishment for whom you work
  • CA Seller's Permit (if your business is in California)

settings.title: Never Struggle Again To Get Your Clients Clear
settings.subtitle: Invest in our clear skin system that has cleared thousands without the use of medication

settings.title: Join the Team of Highly Successful Acne Specialists
settings.bottom_text: Get over 90% of acne clients clear with our training and support. With Proven Strategies for Treating Acne, you will become a confident acne expert and a hero.
settings.title_l: The Face Reality method for clearing acne includes:
settings.content_l:
• Thorough acne and skin analysis
  • How to test for skin sensitivity
  • Step-by-step treatment and home care protocol
  • All the documents you and your client need
  • Important lifestyle guidelines for your client
  • Troubleshooting challenging clients
  • All updates to the course and documents
settings.content_r:
• Wholesale prices for both professional and home care acne specific products
  • Support for your challenging clients
  • Email/phone support with staff
  • Invitation to join private online community
  • Facebook "live events" and webinars
  • Option to add a mentorship day in our San Leandro, CA clinic
  • Get referrals for clients through our database of Certified Acne Specialists (minimum requirements apply)
  • Get invitations to Advanced Training Classes
settings.content_b_l: You need to pass our online certification test (open book) and to provide us with copies of your:
settings.content_b_r:
• esthetics license
  • business license or resale certificate
  • proof of liability insurance for yourself or the establishment for whom you work
  • CA Seller's Permit (if your business is in California)
settings.note_b: *Note: There is only one certification issued per training purchased.

settings.title: Professional Resource Center + Business Tools
settings.text: Access exclusive business building assets 24/7. Download our Acne Home care Guideline, training modules, client forms, before and after images, product information and more. You'll find everything you need to succeed as an acne specialist.

settings.title: Join the Pro Community
settings.text: An invitation to join the Facebook community for Face Reality Certified Pro's where you'll have the opportunity to connect and compare notes with other professionals as well as the Face Reality team.

settings.title: Online Store & Wholesale Product Pricing
settings.text: Access our online store to purchase professional Face Reality Skincare and acne treatment products at wholesale pricing.

settings.title: Exclusive Invitation to Training and Events
settings.text: Receive exclusive invitations to special training, events and opportunities to help you grow your business.

settings.nli_disclaimer: Face Reality does not sell products outside of the United States. Face Reality Training purchases outside of the United States will not be refunded.
settings.li_content:
Now, joining the Face Reality Acne Specialist Team is more affordable than ever. Our certification training is ONLY $500. And it gets better - you’ll also receive a $500 Face Reality product credit*.

With a net cost of $0* there is no reason to delay becoming a Face Reality Certified Professional.

*$500 product credit will be applied in $250 increments over first two orders upon completion of certification process.
settings.li_disclaimer: Once purchased, you will gain access to our training modules, educational tools and certification test. Once you pass the test with 100% and upload your required documents, you’ll gain full access to our professional resource center and premium products at wholesale cost.
